title: Hybrid Instructional Design Program for Strengthening Elementary Science Teachers' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Developing digital tool-based science lesson design and implementation competencies for in-service elementary school teachers

learning_goals: Develop at least three customized lesson plans per science subject incorporating mentoring feedback.
Execute and document five or more student-centered science inquiry classes in a field practicum setting via a video portfolio.
Derive results showing over 20% improvement in instructional effectiveness through peer evaluation and expert review.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
